test.name: BotManagementSystem.Tests.Validation.SemanticKernelValidationTests.ValidatePrompt_WhenExceedsMaxLength_ThrowsArgumentException
test.output: Prompt length exceeds maximum allowed length of 4000 characters. (Parameter 'prompt')

test.name: BotManagementSystem.Tests.Validation.SemanticKernelValidationTests.ValidateChatHistory_WhenContainsBannedPhrase_ThrowsArgumentException
test.output: Banned phrase detected in chat history: Chat history contains prohibited content: hack (Parameter 'chatHistory')

test.name: BotManagementSystem.Tests.Validation.SemanticKernelValidationTests.ValidateChatHistory_WhenEmpty_ThrowsArgumentException
test.output: Chat history cannot be empty. (Parameter 'chatHistory')
